channel.title: Slow Lambda Reactor Core doors and performance problems
channel.description:
When entering the final battle the opening does not become clipped and you're still close enough to walk back towards the airlock. When the doors close you're stuck with this while the finale plays out behind the doors.
![](upload://euBsZgTZtgfJrxBmK3Jfpk1GSqB.jpeg)
Furthermore there's some serious performance problem in this room. On my first attempt it ran fine, but when I died and reloaded the game was very choppy until I restarted BMS.
